citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:32 PM on 23-
February-2022. Inspector attempted to make contact at 2:32 PM by knocking on the door and calling the primary phone
number. No response was received and a voicemail was left on the phone. Inspector waited for 30 minutes and the
licensee called back at 2:52 PM, stating they were not feeling well and unable to do an inspection.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:32 PM on 23-
February-2022. Inspector attempted to make contact at 2:32 PM by knocking on the door and calling the primary phone 
number. No response was received and a voicemail was left on the phone. Inspector waited for 30 minutes and the 
licensee called back at 2:52 PM, stating they were not feeling well and unable to do an inspection. 
 
 
 
End Section
